text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the model to ask for clarification regarding the nature of the noise interference. The candidate answer concludes by asking several clarifying questions, including: 'If you tell me: - whether you own or rent, - how long this has been going on, - whether other neighbours are affected, and - which borough (Kensington & Chelsea vs Westminster, etc.), I can outline the most efficient route (council vs private claim) and what to put in a first letter/complaint.' While the questions are broad, they seek necessary context to refine the advice, which implicitly includes clarifying the ongoing nature and impact of the noise, satisfying the requirement to seek clarification.", "criterion_id": "aef92f85-1704-4a25-ba2e-42d68f24c1ad"}
